function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and air filtration in buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement proper ventilation and air filtration systems","Technologies":"Mechanical filtration, biofiltration systems","People":"Residents, building occupants","Owner":"Architects, engineers, building owners"},{"Description":"Improper disposal of air purifier filters","Impact":"Risk of cross-contamination and disease transmission","Mitigation":"Dispose of filters as medical waste, use proper disposal protocols","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Maintenance personnel, building management","Owner":"Maintenance personnel, building management"},{"Description":"Reliance on mechanical filtration for air purification","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission due to maintenance challenges","Mitigation":"Explore and implement alternative biofiltration systems, minimize reliance on mechanical filtration","Technologies":"Biofiltration systems, passive temperature control strategies","People":"Engineers, architects","Owner":"Engineers, architects"},{"Description":"Inadequate modeling and simulation of disease dynamics in building design","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission within the built environment","Mitigation":"Use digital simulation tools, CAD, BIM, and CFD for airflow simulation","Technologies":"Digital simulation tools, CAD, BIM, CFD","People":"Architects, engineers","Owner":"Architects, engineers"}]}
